scripts.install-all: cd host-app && npm install && cd ../lastmile-app && npm install && cd ../fulfillment-app && npm install
scripts.build-all: cd host-app && npm run build && cd ../lastmile-app && npm run build && cd ../fulfillment-app && npm run build
scripts.start-all: cd host-app && npm start & cd ../lastmile-app && npm start & cd ../fulfillment-app && npm start &
